document.full_text: mayor letizia moratti of milan is running for re-election, but prime minister silvio berlusconi has been trying to turn the campaign into a referendum on himself.
document.title: berlusconi makes election in milan all about him
lines_and_colors: mayor letizia moratti of milan is running for re-election, but prime minister silvio berlusconi has been trying to turn the campaign into a referendum on himself.
